item.title: About
item.description: I write pages on projects that I’m working on. Typically they’re pages on things that either don’t have straightforward documentation or something I’d like to remember in the future.

item.title: Migrate Wiki.js to Another Server
item.description: My migration setup Original server runs WikiJS through docker. One container contains the PostgresDB and the other contains the node server

item.title: Corebooting Thinkpad X220 With CH341A Programmer
item.description: Summary of page This isn't going to be a walkthrough of corebooting your Thinkpad X220. These are the steps you need to get the flasher working and connected to your system

item.title: Automating Chkdsk Scans Using Powershell With Email Alerts for Rmm
item.description: What this does Automatically schedules windows filesystem checks if the drive is detected to have corruption. If corruption occurs more than once per week, an email is sent out to your desired address.

item.title: Automatic Mariadb Backups With Powershell
item.description: Usage Edit the script and modify the variables DBUSER and DBPASS to be your database credentials. You can either run the script standalone or schedule it using the Windows Task Manager to have your incremental backups run

item.title: Add Bitwarden to Pinephone Pro Using Firefox Extension
item.description: Introduction Here's how to get the Bitwarden firefox extension to appear as an application on your PinePhone Pro. Make sure your display scaling is set to 100% for this guide

item.title: Emacs Eww Useful Tips and Tricks
item.description: Introduction These are some of the tweaks I've made that improved the quality of life in EWW. I use evil mode.

item.title: Self Host Pastebin Service With Tempbin
item.description: Objective I write this site using Hugo and wanted a way to quickly upload files and link them in my pages.

item.title: Setup Iventoy With Isc Dhcp Server for Pxe Boot
item.description: Overview Setup the IVentoy server Setup DHCP server to handle DHCP and PXE boot options

item.title: Self Hosting Frog Find on Debian
item.description: Frog Find Frog find is a search engine used for old computers. Anything you search and any link you click gets converted into HTML.

item.title: Termux Chroot Into Arch Linux
item.description: Preface Here's how to chroot into an Arch Linux Arm installation from Termux. This will require a rooted android and a little bit of time

item.title: Mounting Dropbox in Termux Using Dbxfs...almost
item.description: Preface Here's how to install and run DBXFS to mount Dropbox. I'm using a rooted Samsung Galaxy A035M with Termux installed via FDroid.

item.title: Getting the Default Wireless Password to TG1672G Routers
item.description: Preface Here in El Salvador, most houses that use TIGO as their ISP have the same ARRIS TG1672G router.

item.title: Upgrade Windows11 Home to Windows11 Enterprise Without Reinstalling
item.description: Preface I didn't want to pay for a Windows 11 Pro product key and niether did I want to wipe windows to re-install Windows 11 Pro.

item.title: Upgrade a Generation 1 Windows10 Hyperv Vm to Windows11
item.description: Overview You have a bunch of Gen1 VMs running Windows 10 using Legacy Bios. Your goal's to move upgrade them to Gen2 VMs and upgrade them to windows 11.

item.title: Creating an Irc Bouncer With Docker and Znc
item.description: Preface This is a half ass post on setting up ZNC to be your IRC bouncer and enable automatic login for nickserv required servers.

item.title: Dell R720XD Lower Idrac7 Fan Speeds
item.description: Preface My rack server was destroying my eardrums with the fan speeds being too high. I plan to replace the fans with Noctua's, but in the meantime this fix works great.

item.title: How to Clone a Drive to Disimilar Hardware From Bios to Uefi
item.description: FYI Use this as an overview for how to clone a drive. The methods I used for some of the steps can be simplified by using the right tools.

item.title: Victus 15 Fa0xxx Freezing After Suspend Fix
item.description: Preface THIS DIDN'T ACTUALLY FIX IT FOR ME I have a Victus 15 fa0xxx laptop that fails to wake up from suspend.

item.title: How to Merge Hyper-V Snapshots With Powershell
item.description: Identify your child avhdx file Get-VM | Get-VMHardDiskDrive | Select VMName,Path VMName Path ------ ---- Domain Controller D:\VMs\Domain Controller_1023082130.

item.title: How to Migrate a Windows Server Domain From One Server to Another
item.description: Preface This guide assumes you're migrating a domain controller to a new server then demoting the old DC.

item.title: Email Alerts With Fail2ban and Gmail
item.description: Preface Here's how to setup Fail2ban to send email alerts through GMAIL when failed SSH authentications are made. I'm not going to be too detailed on this but I'll provide the link to setting up Exim4 along with my jail.

item.title: Outlook Fix Godaddy Email Server Not Being Found
item.description: The Issue When adding a GoDaddy or Exchange account to outlook, sometimes you'll get this error when outlook attempts to automatically add the email: "Something went wrong and outlook couldn't setup your account".

item.title: Mikrotik Creating a Client to Site Vpn With Wireguard
item.description: Server Setup Let's add a new wireguard interface and give it the name "Wireguard1" The listening port is set to the default port number that the wireguard devs intended.

item.title: Mikrotik Securing Router With Firewall
item.description: Fresh Start Incase you mess up or want a fresh start, run these two commands to clear all firewall rules and address lists.

item.title: Mikrotik Setup Dynamically Changing IP With No-IP Api
item.description: Code Use the System>Scripts page and create a new script with this code. Change the variables under the Script Settings block.

item.title: Windows Server Setup Ssh Server
item.description: Sources https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/terminal/tutorials/ssh https://superuser.com/questions/1501402/how-to-change-ssh-port-on-windows-10 https://www.concurrency.com/blog/may-2019/key-based-authentication-for-openssh-on-windows Installing the Server This will install the SSH server, start the service, and then whitelist the SSH port.

item.title: Windows Server Creating and Viewing a Storport Trace
item.description: Creating a StorPort trace using logman.exe LOGMAN.EXE is CLI utility for creating data collector sets. A data collector set can be thought of as a container for choosing which performance counters or trace events to log.

item.title: Ffmpeg Convert Flac to 320kbs Mp3
item.description: Preface The goal is to convert a flac file into a 320kb/s MP3 file whilst retaining all metadata. The only dependencies you need are "ffmpeg" and "id3v2".

item.title: Ffmpeg Record Selection of Screen
item.description: Preface Depends: slop ffmpeg Here's a script I wrote that lets you select a window or portion of the screen and record it.

item.title: Ffmpeg Use a Dummy Webcam
item.description: Preface I experienced my first proctored exam today. Being that I'm a technologist, I thought it'd be pretty fun to pre-record myself and have that recording output to a virtual webcam.

item.title: Debian Set Custom Font in Tty
item.description: Preface Here's how to setup a custom keymap for your TTY, as well as rebinding the caps key to CTRL.

item.title: Bspwm Dynamic Borders When Toggling Fullscreen
item.description: Preface Dynamically change the border size when there is either a single node or multiple nodes on the focused desktop

item.title: Bspwm With Lembar Panel
item.description: Preface The Arch Wiki doesn't provide any information on how to get lemonbar setup with workspace switching, window titles, etc.

item.title: Bspwm Better Scratchpad
item.description: Better scratchpad bspwm Preface The scratchpad scripts I found for bspwm SUCK. Some either stop working if you kill the terminal or bug out when you manage your window states.

item.title: Raspberry Pi Compile Neovim From Source
item.description: Preface The debian repositories that ship with raspbian come with an outdated version of neovim. Your best option is to compile neovim from github

item.title: Qemu Windows Xp Fix Smb Not Working
item.description: Preface SMB 1.0 has to be enabled if you try to pass a local folder as an smb share to a WinXP Qemu VM.

item.title: Qemu Windows Xp Installation

item.title: Qemu Mount Virtual Images
item.description: Mounting the image apt-get install -y libguestfs-tools # Mounting guestmount -a windows.qcow2 /mnt/ # Mounting read-only mode guestmount -a windows.

item.title: Qemu Chroot Into an Img File
item.description: Preface Full disk images contain the bootloader and partition table. To mount an image file, view the contents of the file, then specify a byte offset that points to the beginning of our linux root partition.

item.title: Qemu Chroot Into a Different Architecture
item.description: Chrooting into systems with different architectures Preface The qemu-user-static package provides several usermode emulation binaries. We can copy these over to our chroot environment to emulate programs from a different architecture.

item.title: Pinebook Pro Troubleshooting Common Issues
item.description: Preface I'm addressing common problem with the pbp more than anything. Go down the list until you find something that's relevant to you.

item.title: Pinebook Pro Setting Up Zram
item.description: Preface ZRAM is essentially compressed memory. Your system uses some of it's CPU cycles to compress redundant data into a reserved area of your ram.

item.title: Pinebook Pro Write to Spi Flash
item.description: WARNING Be prepared to recover your broken SPI flash if an error occurs. When a binary is written to the SPI flash, the SPI flash will be what chooses which drives to boot from.

item.title: Pinebook Pro Use Nvme as Root
item.description: Preface I assume that you have an nvme drive with a formatted ext4 partition present. I'm using Manjaro Arm.

item.title: Pinebook Pro Netbsd Installation
item.description: Preface I'm going to assume that you've already copied the netbsd image to your device and have booted into your system.

item.title: Pinebook Pro Keyboard Firmware Update
item.description: Preface This is a verbatim copy of the directions written on jackhumbert's git. Installtion # compile git clone https://github.

item.title: Pinebook Pro Custom Kernel
item.description: Preface Here's how to compile tsys' mainline linux kernel for the Pinebook Pro. I'm using the "debian way" of installing the kernel.
